lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate. God has blessed me so much in my own life.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: it is within my means.

lenders.name: mike

lenders.loan_because: It sounds like a great opportunity to help others in developing nations.

lenders.name: Diane

lenders.occupational_info: I am training to be a counseling psychologist, which is a person who spends time listening and talking with others about difficulties in their lives, and attempts to encourage them about the present and the future

lenders.name: Art
lenders.loan_because: We must help others in need; very little can go very far.

lenders.name: Dan and Laura

lenders.occupational_info: I do not have a job other than to go to school and do chores.

lenders.name: Linh
lenders.loan_because: It's a good thing.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because:
As I can, how could I not?

KIVA offers me a fantastic way to directly assist persons for whom a little can mean a lot. Still, there is a need for other kinds of support as well (e.g. humanitarian efforts, infrastructure), but this is a fantastic way to help alleviate poverty. And I so admire the entreprenurial spirit! Thank you Kiva for making it possible for me to do my bit in such an easy manner!

Just think about what the world would look like if everybody paid it forward, e.g. via Kiva.

lenders.name: Tamerlane
lenders.loan_because: I'm fascinated by the whole process, and I would like to make a modest difference to global well-being.

lenders.loan_because: I am not rich, in fact quite poor yet there is always someone who is worse off than I am.  Plus these people are very hardworking and trying to better themselves in life.

lenders.name: Jordan
lenders.loan_because: I cannot travel places to help directly, and every day I hear about the troubles people go through just to survive in other parts of the world.  I wanted to help in some way, I figured this was the next best thing.

lenders.name: ROCKY
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people of all walks of life.

lenders.name: Debbie & Gary
lenders.loan_because: Our lives have been blessed in so many ways.  It is important to us to give back in some way.
lenders.occupational_info: Gary is a retired math teacher.  Debbie is a retired school secretary.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the entrepreneurial spirit and am confident that with dedication, persistence, and a little luck my seed money can help needy individuals succeed in their business endeavors.

lenders.name: Kw33n
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves so that they may improve their lives and those of their families.  I especially want to assist women in finding financial independence so they are not subjected to lives of violence - emotional, physical and sexual abuse.

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: I am a woman, a wife, a mother, a sister.
lenders.occupational_info: I help children with their school work.

lenders.name: O J
lenders.loan_because: I admire those who work hard and who are motivated to help themselves.

lenders.name: Curt
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people a chance to become self-sufficient. and live an honorable life.
lenders.occupational_info: I began as a Minnesota farmboy and retired from large international company where I developed new business in packaging products.  I now get great satisfaction from volunteering to help others in many ways.  I help fix broken things!

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: We live mostly off the land we work and so we like to help others do the same, but know often they need help getting that first leg up.  That is why we prefer to make loans to those in agriculture.  It makes me feel connected to the world.

lenders.name: Arno
lenders.loan_because:
I like the idear.
Me gusta la idea.
lenders.occupational_info:
All relationated with tourism.
Todo relacionado con turismo

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: Helping people to help themselves is fantastic and Kiva makes it so easy and fun.
lenders.occupational_info: Financial accounting for a hospital.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: I encourage entrepreneurial endeavors. I am going to run a half-marathon and raise money for a few Kiva micro-loan.  That will be my good work to raise the funds for someone else's work.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach computer skills in Word, Excel, and internet to people who have been rehabilitated and wanting work skills.

lenders.name: steve
lenders.loan_because: I want to help somehow...

lenders.name: Mueller Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to share our great blessings with others.
lenders.occupational_info: Learning about the world every day in a hands on manner.

lenders.name: Phil & Ann Marie
lenders.loan_because: Repaying a loan helps build dignity and pride and helps improve the lives of yourself and your loved ones gives you hope and confidence that things can get better. That said, I make loans because it makes me feel good to be helping others.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I want to help even if it is very little.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It seems to be the best use of my money to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from business, I was in industrial equipment sales (conveyors) and then studied and was ordained into ministry.  I served as chaplain at a retirement community for 8 yrs 9 mos.

lenders.name: Jim M
lenders.loan_because: I support capitalism and the entrepreneurial spirit in the purest sense!

lenders.name: Ezra
lenders.loan_because: I want to reduce suffering in the world.

lenders.name: Raye
lenders.loan_because: I've heard so much about micro finance and wished I could get involved, now I can for the small amount I can afford to advance.
lenders.occupational_info: I listen to doctor's dictation of medical reports about their patients and then transcribe what they say into text on my computer so others can read it.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I help employees so they are treated equally.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur too, I want to help, and show God's love in the process.
lenders.occupational_info: Looking for good deals in buying shares of businesses, currencies, and real estate.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it's a smart investment.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Buyer for a company that designs and subcontracts the building of winglets that go on the tips of the wings of Boeing airplanes.  Winglets improve the fuel efficiency of certain Boeing passenger planes by creating more lift.  I buy parts that make up these winglets.

lenders.name: judi
lenders.loan_because: it makes the lives of our sisters and brothers across the world just a little better, and if that's not worth doing, what is?
lenders.occupational_info: i work in a newspaper office taking care of the mail, phone calls, research, copyediting etc..

lenders.name: Edwin Ding    陳 玟成
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Please refer to http://www.linkedin.com/in/edwinding

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: Helping out others in need is the basic cornerstone of life. I especially like to loan money to women owned businesses where they are trying to make a better life for themselves and their families. You Go Girls!!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a recording/audio engineer.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Location Scout and Manager in the entertainment industry finding and supervising locations for commercial, television and film production.

lenders.name: Massimo

lenders.occupational_info: a passion for portrait travel photography.

lenders.name: LOVEFiLM
lenders.occupational_info: We are an online DVD rental company based in the UK, with branches in Germany and Sweden.

lenders.name: Mel
lenders.loan_because: From little things, big things grow.  Small loans can make big differences to individuals, families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children and families who are experiencing significant challenges to their mental health and emotional wellbeing.

lenders.name: ian
lenders.occupation: a little of this a little of that

lenders.name: Ifeanyi
lenders.occupation: Worker for Shell Oil Company in Nigeria
lenders.loan_because: I am stranded over in Nigeria.  My children are located in Virginia and I am not able to get back to the states.  The company that I work for is not paying us right now and I have no means of getting back to the United States.  Whatever you can do to help me out will be greatly appreciated.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at the Shell Oil Company but I am not getting paid at the moment.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It's how I can still help, former Peace Corps and Habitat worker.
lenders.occupational_info: Oversee operation of bus systems throughout the southeast part of US

lenders.name: Åsa
lenders.loan_because: It seems to be a good way to make a difference.

lenders.name: Amrita & Raj
lenders.loan_because: We believe in making a difference by helping those who seek to better their lives.

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because: I can’t think of a better foreign relations policy than this.  Kiva provides a pure and unfettered approach to helping honest people earn an honest living.  The ripple effect of these small businesses can be tremendous.  I love this concept and intend on expanding my portfolio over time.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: This is the most amazing idea.  One of my favorite quotes is "be the change you want to see in the world".  There are times when a person just needs a little help and if I can be a small part of someone realizing a goal, what could be better than that?  I love the individual aspect of this.  Many times when you give to large organizations you have no idea where the money actually goes and if it really goes to the person you want to help.
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm a voracious reader, an animal activist, and a woman who wants to make a difference in the world.
I was a founding member of a canine rescue organization in the United States and care very deeply for the disenfranchised people who share this planet.

lenders.name: Kris
lenders.loan_because: I live a pretty good life, the least I can do is help others make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I produce all radio and television programming for PossibilitiesMedia, as well as maintain the websites of C2 Church and Possibilities Church.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I must!
lenders.occupational_info: Fix the processes we use at the bank to make them better or faster for the customer

lenders.name: Cheryl

lenders.occupational_info: I help people upgrade their job skills through educational practices.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Susan & Peter

lenders.name: MGU Alumni
lenders.loan_because:
MGU Alumni Microfinance is a network of former MGU students wishing to support small entrepreneurs in the former Soviet republics. 

We all recieved a big bundle of help and encouragement while living in Moscow and struggling to learn Russian, and we wish to give some of that encourangement back those who are currently struggling to realise their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: MGU Alumni Microfinance is an independent network consisting of former students. It has no official ties to Moskovski Gosudarstvennyi Universitet, the Moscow State University.

lenders.name: PAOLO
lenders.loan_because: I believe in this kind of help

lenders.name: Kopfwerk Germany
lenders.loan_because: As an entrepreneur I know that you need money to start a business, to start to earn money. We have the potential to help, so it is our duty to simply do it.
lenders.occupational_info: Kopfwerk is a small creative agency with the wish to help to make this world a better place. Our team of 6 people likes to get involved and wants to change lives. If you like that idea and wiah to contact us, please visit our website.

lenders.name: Sam and Marlys
lenders.loan_because: we can't afford to give as much as we want, but we DO want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Sam is the lead minister at a church in Cary, NC.  Marlys works for a bank, leading a team that takes care of people's retirement accounts.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I can't do a lot....but I can do this.

lenders.name: Marcello

lenders.occupational_info: helping to get resources to where they are needed.

lenders.name: Berit

lenders.name: Manuel & Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: regardless of our cultural differences we all share the same fundamental humanness, struggles and hopes.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with hospitals to underake projects and my wife assists persons in dealing with the challenges in their lives.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because:
I believe a loan that helps a person help himself or herself improves the world in a different and perhaps better way than just giving money.   

A person who receives a loan, improves his or her business,  and then  pays it back, can take extra pride in his or her accomplishments.   Thus, these loans uplift the human spirit as well as the standard of living.

lenders.name: Lewis & Donna
lenders.loan_because: it has been said "give a man a fish and you feed him for a day, but teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime." We hope to help people change their lives.
lenders.occupational_info:
Lewis is an investigator with the Texas Department of Public Safety.
Donna is an RN at a local hospital.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: it is action.

lenders.loan_because: I think it's the best way to enable others to achieve success.

lenders.occupational_info: I help my company invest our money in very large businesses and help them to grow and make more profit.

lenders.occupational_info: Diana works with computer software while I design web sites.

lenders.occupational_info: As I am retired I mainly do community work where I now live and I am an active member of Rotary.

lenders.loan_because: Someday, and that day may never come, I'll call upon you to do a service for me. But until that day accept this as a gift .

lenders.name: NYU Reynolds Program
lenders.occupational_info: The NYU Reynolds Program in Social Entrepreneurship is designed to attract, encourage and train a new generation of leaders in public service. We aim to provide the cross-disciplinary skills, experiences and networking opportunities needed to advance and support changemaker efforts to realize sustainable and scalable pattern-breaking solutions to society's most intractable problems.

lenders.name: Nine
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a small charity providing support to sex workers.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help economic development across the globe

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: People need direct help. Not relying on governments and losing the money in the process.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: Through my travels I see how little it takes to make someone smile. If I can help, then I smile too.
lenders.occupational_info: I love my job. I get to discover something new every day, and I don't have to wear heels.

lenders.name: Pai NYC
lenders.loan_because: We should all do more small things with great love...I plan to add more loans to my portfolio throughout 2011-2012.
lenders.occupational_info:
Finance grad from the top undergraduate business school in the US. Researched socially-responsible investments (SRI) and sustainable banking in grad school back in 2003!  Wall Street financial and healthcare reform loooong overdue...!

Currently Reading:
Don't Ask What I Shot: How President Eisenhower’s Love of Golf Helped Shape 1950’s America 
http://www.amazon.com/Dont-Ask-What-Shot-Eisenhowers/dp/0071485708

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: I believe we have to do what we can to raise standards of living in other areas of the world.  Furthermore, I want to cultivate and encourage the entrepreneurial spirit in individuals that live in areas where it is often difficult to succeed.  I firmly believe in "a hand up- not a hand out."
lenders.occupational_info:
I buy and sell vehicles (cars, trucks, rvs, etc) as well as work as a loan originator at an office that assists borrowers seeking short-term secured lending.  Our company also offers residential and commercial property management services from our office in Boise.
I live in Meridian with my wife, Misty- and have an adult son, named Alex.  We enjoy camping, boating, hiking, travel, snowshoeing, amateur radio (KC7CBF) and photography. (www.flickr.com/kc7cbf)

Be sure to SHOW ME "KIVA LOVE!!!"  If you heard of Kiva from me- please list my email as your referrer when you sign up- then I can keep up with you on Kiva!  Nick(a)e2800.com  -Thanks!
.

lenders.name: Oren
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of people to succeed, I love people that follow their dream.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: for me it is an expression of gratitude for the richness of my own life.

lenders.loan_because: This seems like a great way to help and empower people.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because:
"But we were born of risen apes, not fallen angels, and the apes were armed killers besides. And so what shall we wonder at? Our murders and massacres and missiles, and our irreconcilable regiments? Or our treaties whatever they may be worth; our symphonies however seldom they may be played; our peaceful acres, however frequently they may be converted into battlefields; our dreams however rarely they may be accomplished. The miracle of man is not how far he has sunk but how magnificently he has risen. We are known among the stars by our poems, not our corpses."
— Robert Ardrey

lenders.name: Nico & Nadine

lenders.name: Zeffy
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves. A lending hand can do wonders.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a civil engineer.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: In this world where some of us are so fortunate to have so much while others have so little, it is important to give back to the broader community.  Given the opportunity others can do so much to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach courses on Latin America and Third World development.

lenders.name: Uju
lenders.loan_because: I love helping people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student and a stay-at-home mom

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a department of the most wonderful staff that anyone could ever have. We always help those who need it.  I am blessed to be able to work with such wonderful people.  We work for a health insurance company as analysts.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: it is a wonderful way to "make a difference" by helping others pursue their dreams.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: It's a simple yet incredibly effective way of helping people and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people to help them create more efficient and safer places to live and work.

lenders.name: Jenn
lenders.loan_because: In order to soar, you must fly. In order to fly, you must jump. Here is the courage to jump!!
